mapper.select: select count(prod_no) from ( select prod.prod_no, prod.name, prod.comp_name, prod.img, rt.rating_avg , pt.name as prodtype_name, ca.category_name from rating_avg_view rt, tbl_product prod, tbl_prod_type pt ,tbl_category ca where prod.prod_no = rt.prod_no and pt.prodtype_no = prod.prodtype_no and ca.category_no = pt.category_no order by rating_avg desc ) where prod_no > 0

select prod.prod_no, prod.name, prod.comp_name, prod.price, prod.link, prod.img, prod.regdate, prod.prodtype_no, pt.name as prodtypeName, rt.rating_avg
from tbl_product prod, rating_avg_view rt, tbl_prod_type pt where prod.prod_no = rt.prod_no and pt.prodtype_no = prod.prodtype_no and prod.prod_no = #{prodNo}

select prod.prod_no, prod.name, prod.comp_name, prod.price, prod.link, prod.img, prod.regdate, prod.prodtype_no, pt.name as prodtypeName, rt.rating_avg
from tbl_product prod, rating_avg_view rt, tbl_prod_type pt where prod.prod_no = rt.prod_no and pt.prodtype_no = prod.prodtype_no and prod.prod_no = #{prodNo}
